properties.name: ceasa.security.ad.groups.allowed-roles
properties.description: Quais roles aceitas (sem prefixo ROLE_). Ex: USER,ADMIN,SUPORTE

properties.name: ceasa.security.ad.groups.group-prefix
properties.description: Prefixo dos grupos no AD (CN). Ex: APP_AUDESP_ ou APP_CEASA_SECURITY_

properties.name: ceasa.security.ad.groups.group-search-base
properties.description: Onde procurar grupos (relativo ao baseDn). Ex: OU=GRUPOS,OU=PID,OU=Ceasa Campinas

properties.name: ceasa.security.ad.groups.group-search-filter
properties.description: Filtro de busca de grupos. Default (member={0})

properties.name: ceasa.security.ad.groups.role-prefix
properties.description: Prefixo das roles no Spring. Ex: ROLE_AUDESP_ ou ROLE_CEASA_

properties.name: ceasa.security.ad.ldap.bind-dn
properties.description: Conta de serviço para search (UPN ou DN). Ex: svc_ldap_app@ceasacps.com.br

properties.name: ceasa.security.ad.ldap.user-search-base
properties.description: Base para procurar usuários. Vazio = baseDn

properties.name: ceasa.security.ad.ldap.user-search-filter
properties.description: Filtro para procurar usuário. Default sAMAccountName
